text: A leadership election for the Civic Democratic Party (ODS) was held on 23 November 1991. Václav Klaus was confirmed as the leader of ODS. 327 delegates voted for him while 14 voted against him. ==Results== {| class="wikitable style=text-align:right !Candidate !Votes !% |- |align=left|Václav Klaus||327||95.89 |- |align=left|Against||14||4.11 |- |align=left|Total||341||100 |} ==References== 1991 November Category:1991 elections in Czechoslovakia Civic Category:Elections in Plzeň
title: November 1991 Civic Democratic Party leadership election
